original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = c.UserId AND u.Id = ph.UserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND c.Score=0 AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-20 10:52:57' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=5 AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2011-01-31 15:35:37' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.Reputation<=356 AND u.DownVotes<=34 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-19 21:29:29' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-20 14:31:46' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0 AND comments.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-20 10:52:57'
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 5 AND postHistory.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2011-01-31 15:35:37'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E3.UserId=E2.UserId)

CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) >= 1 AND CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) <= 356 AND users.DownVotes <= 34 AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 21:29:29' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-20 14:31:46')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E3E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E3E2.UserId=E4.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E2E4 WHERE E1.UserId=E3E2E4.UserId)
